texto: 6.1 General The organization should plan, design and develop an e ffective and e fficient dispute-resolution process. This includes the creation of necessary procedures for the dispute-resolution process. The organization should understand the expectations and perceptions of customers and other relevant interested parties related to dispute resolution. When establishing and using a dispute resolution process, the organization should consider and address risks and opportunities that can arise.
